Class AndroidApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.arachnidium.model.abstractions.ModelObject<S>

        • com.github.arachnidium.model.mobile.MobileApplication
          • com.github.arachnidium.model.mobile.android.AndroidApp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDestroyable, IDecomposable, IDecomposableByHandles<HowToGetMobileScreen>, io.appium.java_client.android.AndroidDeviceActionShortcuts, io.appium.java_client.android.HasAppStrings, io.appium.java_client.android.HasNetworkConnection, io.appium.java_client.android.StartsActivity, io.appium.java_client.DeviceActionShortcuts, org.openqa.selenium.html5.LocationContext, org.openqa.selenium.internal.WrapsDriver

    public abstract class AndroidApp
extends MobileApplication
implements io.appium.java_client.android.AndroidDeviceActionShortcuts, io.appium.java_client.android.HasAppStrings, io.appium.java_client.android.HasNetworkConnection, io.appium.java_client.android.StartsActivity
    It is the same as MobileApplication with some capabilities of Android. It works only with AndroidDriver
